website_summaries.verdict: An aesthetically pleasing and compact design. The perfect choice for use in shorter glasses.
pros: The compact 8-inch size is perfect for use in shorter glasses
The black and stainless steel design is sleek and modern
The wide bottom with pointed teeth effectively muddles fruits with ease
Muddler feels solid without being too heavy
cons: Smooth stainless steel is slightly harder to grip

customer_reviews.title: Recommended. Here’s why...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this instead of the more expensive Oxo model based on cost, reviews, and appearance. It’s such a simple device that it seemed like a no-brainer. I can report that it was a good decision. I like Oxo in general but this one looked just as good. As long as there’s no issue with the tip coming unglued or other manufacturing problem, this appears to be just as good, just as attractive (but different), and cheaper than the Oxo product. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Wilderness Techno GeekTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Mint Juleps are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: After trying to make mint juleps for this year's Kentucky Derby (2019) and not having a real minty taste like they are supposed to, I ordered a muddler. When it came I tested it. Minty, cool and delicious. Think I'll have another. Maybe three.
customer_reviews.author: DUGAL MAC

customer_reviews.title: Mashes fruit nicely
customer_reviews.text: I bought this muddler to crush berries to mix with non-fat yogurt for a diabetic diet. I use it every morning. It can be tough to clean berry guts out of the "teeth" if you let it dry and harden, but soaking the business end in hot water (or cleaning it promptly) helps. It's also nice that the muddler is dishwasher safe. Also, I like saying "muddler"
customer_reviews.author: Mr. James

customer_reviews.title: but that wide bottom really gets in there and muddles quite nicely. And reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I wanted in a muddler. Not too heavy so that it demolishes the ingredients, but that wide bottom really gets in there and muddles quite nicely. And reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Dinakar Sarma

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I needed a cocktail muddler but some drinks call for muddling sugar etc. and I love having every gadget. This works very well, easy to clean and it's sturdy. Plus, my NYC bartender Nephew gave it his seal of approval. Glad I purchased it. I rinse it by hand, don't know how it would hold up in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dagostino

customer_reviews.title: This muddler is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning to order a nice non-wooden muddler for sometime now as I have been using a pampered chef tool not specified for this purpose. The price was great and I was very excited when it arrived. I have only used it a couple of times, but it works great! It is easy to clean and light weight too. The 8" size is perfect for rocks glasses and martini mixers! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Fleetwood

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Kitchen Gadget
customer_reviews.text: We looked everywhere for one of these and was excited to find this one at the price and on Amazon. It is perfect for muddling our mojitos and does the job right. It rinses off and washes very easily. It is good quality, looks very nice and sturdy and we absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine

customer_reviews.title: Quality piece for the money thus far.
customer_reviews.text: OK... BUY. Never had a "Muddler" BUT for my first one, this is a GOOD buy. Sturdy sleek stainless steel look/feel. Good groove make up on the bottom. Worth the price. Don't "muddle" over whether or not to buy if you need one of these (bada dum bump) I'm hellah picky but this is a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable & Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased multiple for a crafting cocktails and it was perfect to crush mint/basil leaves/fruit. Easy to wash and throw into the dishwasher if needed. Stainless steel is reliable, smooth, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: NickV_and_JessV

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I never had a muddler before and always just tried to make do with the back of a wooden spoon when making mojitos. Wow, what a difference this makes! It's well made and looks sleek and nice with my shaker.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: This is exactly what you need
customer_reviews.text: This product is heavier than I expected, although I’d say that is a good thing. Funny enough I purchased the cocktail mixing set that came with one of these, I didn’t realize this until both products came in so now I have two. If you’re looking for a cocktail mixing set get the one this brand makes as it comes with a wooden stand and everything you need for a low price. Either way, this product seems to be made well and I wish we had one of these back when I bartended.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Must have.
customer_reviews.text: The muddler is really good, I had some concerns when I was buying it, because that black head might break my glass, because it's steel. But it is not, it made of hard plastic, but solid and strong to squeeze juice from lime/lemon. I'd definitely recommend it to have in you bar tools collection.
customer_reviews.author: YD

customer_reviews.title: I might go longer...
customer_reviews.text: I have large hands and find this barely reaches outside of a glass. That said, it's a beautiful tool and feels of good quality. If I could order again, I'd look for a 10-12" muddler.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: A great little tool. Didn't think I would use it as much as I do. I have had it for a few months and use it quite often to mash anything that needs mashing (mint leaves, lemons, limes, beans, sweet potatoes, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Alba X L

customer_reviews.title: Won't scratch non-stick ceramic surfaces
customer_reviews.text: Good leverage, and I use it for an application where I muddle ginger slices right in my sauce pan before boiling them. It muddles well, and after many uses there is no sign of damage to the non-stick pan.
customer_reviews.author: Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Better options
customer_reviews.text: Works well unless you are crushing sugar cubes for you cocktail. The crushing end has a plastic serrated bottom that will clunk up and stick, wasting ingtedients. A better option would be one without the serrated grinder, something smooth.
customer_reviews.author: SouthPaw Guitar

customer_reviews.title: Great for Guac
customer_reviews.text: I got this to use to make guacamole. something better that just using a fork and spoon. It works great. Mashes avocados instantly. Even when some are not quite ripe all the way. Smashes them in seconds. I love it and easy to clean. Just run under water and rub finger across rubber end. I'm making it about every other day.
customer_reviews.author: 2cats2many

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well built, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I debated between wooden and metal/plastic; wanted the simplicity of wood but knew a plastic tip would clean better. Glad I got this model. It works perfectly in muddling a drink. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Celllman

customer_reviews.text: It works great! Only thing is that in the dishwasher, water gets in between the metal and plastic and doesn’t drain.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Son uses this to muddle drink mixes and is very happy. Nice size, and easy to clean. Textured end does a good job breaking down mint, and pressing fruit to release juices.
customer_reviews.author: mtnel

customer_reviews.title: Love it, your wife may steal it if your not careful
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, so good my wife keeps stealing it. It seems to just disappear from the drawer and can’t ever find it, found the dang thing in the shower one day. But at least it’s getting used Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy tool
customer_reviews.text: Good product, great price. Arrived on time and does what it's supposed to do. I had previously been using the blunt end of a wooden spoon to muddle my lime and mint for mojitos but this works much better! lol Cleans easily, just rinse off and throw in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C

customer_reviews.title: Practical & Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this stylish muddler because I've been leary of wood tools being sanitary. and not harboring bacteria. This is very easy to clean and looks professional at your home cocktail area.
customer_reviews.author: Noele

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy muddler, good grip!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to grip while making drinks. The end doesn't get fruit prices stuck in it after muddling, which is really nice and makes cleaning very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Juls S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item to mash fruits that I put into drinks and overnight oats. It's easy to use and clean. I just pop it in my dishwasher and use it again the next morning!
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sturdy stainless steel muttler.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sturdy stainless steel muttler. It has a very nice shape that makes it easy to grasp and use. Very sturdy! Super easy to clean. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: harleyrrt

customer_reviews.title: Great price of equipment
customer_reviews.text: This was a game changer for my cocktail making. I have a mint plant and love to make mojitos, but I'd spend ten minutes crushing the mint with the bottom of a wooden spoon. This cuts the time down to 30 seconds. Easy to clean, sturdy, great tool.
customer_reviews.author: iray

customer_reviews.title: Shaped like a sex toy.  Attracts attention!😂
customer_reviews.text: Great for crushing fruit for mules...but..had it standing upright on counter and my older kids were laughing because the handle looks like a sex toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Deleon

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty quality. Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy duty masher great for old fashions and muddling oranges and cherries. Nice heavy duty quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good purchase for the price only drawback is you have to be mindful not to put on dishwasher otherwise it gets water inside
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: This product is absolutely perfect. It doesn't excellent job muddling fruit, sturdy, easy-to-hold and cleans up very easily. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: jimmyc

customer_reviews.title: Very superior to the wooden muddles I’m used too and super easy to clean!
customer_reviews.text: Love this muddled way better than the wood ones I’m used to at other bars and way easier to clean by far!
customer_reviews.author: m.boyer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and mashes our sugar
customer_reviews.text: It works well for making cocktails and mashing the things we need to mash. Happy with this...
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Rubber bottom is perfect and protects glass.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for muddling mint and other herbs in my water glass. The rubber bottom is perfect to both protect my glasses and bruise the mint without breaking it up. It works as intended and is a terrific product.
customer_reviews.author: NikonLee

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my boyfriend
customer_reviews.text: He loves to make old fashions. I tried to make one with this tool for him once, apparently I had been using the wrong end. Both sides work just as well!!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: Handy size
customer_reviews.text: 8" handle muddler was great size to use to make an individual mojito. Very sturdy and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: jancan

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Sleek looking and comfortable to hold, making it very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Hanora1127

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Durable and easy to use. Muddles various herbs and fruits for drinks very well.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for mint
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for mint ..cleans up well with no lingering smell...very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: CAROL WALKER

customer_reviews.title: Does a decent job
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty good. It could be a little more heavy duty and the black indents aren’t very deep. It’s does a decent job, but could be slightly better.
customer_reviews.author: A. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Useful without being a lot of work
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful tool for making delicious drinks with fruit. Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: lorib

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: The rubber tips came off after couple time of use. Muddler have to be wooden. I learned my lesson
customer_reviews.author: AMY C.

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend loves it
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I fell in love with spicy margaritas in Scottsdale this spring. Only a few restaurants make them so I ordered this muddler to make them at home. It works great. A must for anyone who likes to make spicy drinks and food. By far the best value.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked the rubber tip when crushing sugar cubes, etc.
customer_reviews.author: John F. Ziolkowski

customer_reviews.title: The must for a perfect Mojito
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what it’s supposed to do. Muddles a mean Mojito!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Muddler
customer_reviews.text: I love this muddler because it is easy to clean and really does a great job of mixing ingredients together.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmmm
customer_reviews.text: Works awesome and my bourbon has never been so happy to be muddled with sugar, strawberries, and basil
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Received this product it was beyond our expectations; is it made very well and seals without spillage while shaking; I have not had this in the past with our old shaker. Cheers to a great product!!! would definitely order again
customer_reviews.author: Arlene gazdich

customer_reviews.title: Good weight to it
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. It has a good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: ACee

customer_reviews.title: Philz Coffee Mint Mocha Mojito
customer_reviews.text: You need this to make that drink. It muddles the mint leaves. This tool works to that end. Go get it.
customer_reviews.author: Philthy G

customer_reviews.title: nice muddler... does a nice job... easy to clean too...
customer_reviews.text: nice muddler... I have a similar one already, but needed an extra. Luck using good muddlers like this one mostly for muddling mint for mojitos, but also for fruit pieces, etc... nice sturdy and easy to clean. only used briefly for one Mojito so far... but nice quality and nice price
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great Muddler . . .
customer_reviews.text: Use this to make Mojitos or Old Fashions. Great tool to have for the bar.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Good little tool
customer_reviews.text: has held up will and is comfortable to use--just wish it was a little longer
customer_reviews.author: margaret grant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Muddler, and hilariously it looks like a sex toy
customer_reviews.text: It's a very good muddler, and it is not a coincidence that the manufacturers designed it to look exactly like a stainless steel dildo. Which invites hilarious comments when you're mixing someone's drink.
customer_reviews.author: McLovin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just your average everyday muddler! I prefer metal over wood since it’s easier to clean and isn’t porous!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Cleans well and was happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good Qaulity
customer_reviews.text: It needs to have sharper tines bc it has some difficulty muddling leaves. Good build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Hobbiesof

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I love the product, however if put in the dishwasher, handle fills with water and it does not come apart to remove water.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed it for - smushing black berries for cocktails. Love it
customer_reviews.author: SamcroFan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: During COVID quarantine, I have been experimenting with cocktails. I needed a muddler, this was the perfect price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ria

customer_reviews.title: High quality and works beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting a cocktail muddler for so long and this one is just perfect for my new jalapeño cucumber martinis.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to make guac actually. I don't like how mortar and pestals get sandy and seem to break easy, and the french ones are just too expensive. This is very ergonomic and sturdy. Very easy to clean. Does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: yee seul chun

customer_reviews.title: Simple and effective
customer_reviews.text: I used this muddler to make mint moscow mules. It worked great. It's nice looking and muddled the mint well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sturdy and gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: First use was for a corporate event. I made about 50 blackberry bourbon splashes in a span of couple hours and this mullet made it easy to smash through all the blackberries and mint leaves. It was very sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Park

customer_reviews.title: A bit short but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great muddler for low ball/tumbler glasses. It's too short for a 24oz shaker. No matter how much you tell yourself that you will muddle carefully, by the third round your muddled oranges will be blood oranges wether you like it or not. Go for a 12" muddler if you have a 24oz and like your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Adams

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves his muddler.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these muddlers. He now has three of them. They are a handy size, easy to clean, and attractive. And they do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Sara M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Muddler!
customer_reviews.text: High quality muddler. The stainless steel allows for easy cleaning and the muddling part at the top is the perfect size for muddling all sorts of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This muddler works great! A little difficult to clean, depending on what you muddle. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Butler

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Cleans up nicely!
customer_reviews.text: SO glad I finally ordered this! the length is perfect. It does the job well and cleans easily with no odors left behind. Definitely a must for mixing specialty drinks!
customer_reviews.author: Abycarr

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to use this yet but it is of real good quality and i like the classiness of it. Came in the mail quickly to.
customer_reviews.author: Pita6245

customer_reviews.title: Strong, easy to clean, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: The title of the review says it all, this muddler was something I purchased as a beginning bartender, and I love it (especially for mojitos)! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: PoliceBoxAt221B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cocktail muddler!
customer_reviews.text: Has helped me create perfect Old Fashionds. I clean it with a brush. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stockwell

customer_reviews.title: Very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best muddler that I have ever used. Sturdy and it has a rubber tip so it Catches the mint leaves but does not scratch the cup. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: dbullock1515

customer_reviews.title: Works great, no rust, nice feel
customer_reviews.text: What's not to like about this product. It's great in every way. Many bar products are junk and rust quickly. Not this one. It's high quality and feels great in the hands.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Muddler
customer_reviews.text: It’s a muddler that works as designed! Mint Juleps, here we come!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great muddler
customer_reviews.text: Simple, clean design looks great on my bar cart or in a drawer. Easy to use- easy to clean. Would recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: The plastic end is gentle on our bar ware and muddles nicely. Why didn’t we buy this sooner?

customer_reviews.title: Great for mojitos. Doesn't tear the leaves
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quick. Works great for muddling mint for our mojitos Doesn't tear the leaves but firmly turns the leaves to get that great scent and oils into the drink. Got to admit the shape is a bit phallic!

customer_reviews.title: What I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used the mudder since it is a gift. It looks like a nice solid piece.

customer_reviews.text: Muddling sugar cubes causes some of the silicone to flake off into the drink.

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Was a great present!

product_meta.title: 8" Long Stainless Steel Cocktail Muddlers by HQY, Muddler
product_meta.description:
Color:Stainless Steel 

HQY COCKTAIL MUDDLER - Create delicious refreshing cocktails

Creating exquisite cocktails requires not only the right ingredients but the right tools as well. Professional bartenders will tell you that the muddler is one of their most indispensable tools. The muddler is essential for thoroughly blending the flavors of herbs, spices and fruits used in many popular cocktails. The Mojito, Mint Julep, old Fashioned and Capipiroska all require muddling to make them taste fabulous! This "muddling" of the ingredients brings forth a burst of flavor when the alcohol is poured into the glass over the mixture.

Traditional muddlers are made out of lacquered wood, which often, over time, becomes difficult to clean and can lead to polluting your drinks. This new modern version is made of stainless steel which will remain beautiful and never add unwanted tastes to your drinks. It has a grooved nylon head for through mashing (muddling) of ingredients.

A well-stocked bar includes fine liquor and all the bartender's tools, so don't forget your HQY muddler. It may well inspire you to open up a cocktail book and try a new drink.

Satisfaction Guaranteed!

To ensure your complete satisfaction we also back our product with a 30 day replacement guarantee!

Be ready for your next cocktail party and order your HQY muddler today!
feature_bullets: ◆HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL - This Premium muddler made out of the strongest material available and WILL NOT BREAK when muddling. This bar tool muddler will not peel or rust.

◆BEST MUDDLER FOR YOUR BAR TOOLS COOLECTION - Using this cocktail muddler is a great way to create a delicious cocktails. This bar muddler is Perfect for: Muddling Mint Leaves, Mashing Citrus Fruits Herbs and Spices and Making Delicious Mojitos and Other Cocktails.
◆EASY TO CLEAN - Once finished using the Cocktail Muddler, it's very easy to clean it by hand or just placing it inside the dishwasher since this Cocktail Muddler is
◆DISHWASHER SAFE. So feel free to clean it whatever you'd like.
◆RISK FREE PURCHASE GUARANTEE!-We are commited to bringing you the best quality.If you are not 100% satisfied with us,Please contact us,we will replace your item or refund you.You have my word!!!
